title: Profit with Purpose
description: Profit with Purpose is a professional website developed for the Profit with Purpose organization at the University of Virginia. Their goal is to deliver impact-based consulting and investment to early-stage ESG startups from diverse perspectives. This project was created in collaboration with the organization to design and populate the website's content.

title: PeerReview
description: PeerReview is a two-sided review platform developed to be used by over 300 students each semester in the Software Engineering course at The University of Virginia. It allows students to anonymously review their teammates and professors to easily search for teams, reviews, and students. Beta version out now!

title: UVAStudySpaces
description: A catalog of study spaces at the University of Virginia. Explore, search, view, and submit information about various study spots around UVA. Powered by the Google Maps API.

title: FlickVault
description: A personal movie backlog and history written with PHP. Awarded "Most Usable" design in Programming Languages for Web Applications at UVA.

title: HoosHeard
description: Welcome to HoosHeard, an anonymous social media platform with daily prompts to help your voice be heard!

title: Machine Learning for Virginia
description: This project explores SOL (Standards of Learning) pass rates in Virginia using machine learning techniques such as Random Forest Regression and K-means Clustering.

title: Lorem Squarepants
description: A Lorem Ipsum generator full of quotes from the SpongeBob SquarePants show!

title: Credit Score Simulator
description: Awarded 1st place in finance track of the 2023 HooHacks Hackathon by building a gamified credit score simulator with 3 friends in under 24 hours.

title: Wisdom Widget
description: An Chrome Extension to help take notes with OpenAI.

title: This Portfolio!
description: Designed in Figma and styled with vanilla CSS.
